BluetoothCharacteristicProperties.summary: NOTE Experimental The BluetoothCharacteristicProperties interface of the Web Bluetooth API provides the operations that are valid on the given .

remarks.para: This interface is returned by calling .

BluetoothCharacteristicPropertiesAuthent.summary:
NOTE Experimental The authenticatedSignedWrites read-only
property of the interface returns a
boolean that is true if signed writing to the characteristic
value is permitted.

BluetoothCharacteristicPropertiesBroadca.summary:
NOTE Experimental The broadcast read-only property of the
interface returns a
boolean that is true if the broadcast of the characteristic
value is permitted using the Server Characteristic Configuration Descriptor.

BluetoothCharacteristicPropertiesIndicat.summary:
NOTE Experimental The indicate read-only property of the
interface returns a
boolean that is true if indications of the characteristic
value with acknowledgement is permitted.

BluetoothCharacteristicPropertiesNotify.summary:
NOTE Experimental The notify read-only property of the
interface returns a
boolean that is true if notifications of the characteristic
value without acknowledgement is permitted.

BluetoothCharacteristicPropertiesRead.summary:
NOTE Experimental The read read-only property of the
interface returns a
boolean that is true if the reading of the characteristic
value is permitted.

BluetoothCharacteristicPropertiesReliabl.summary:
NOTE Experimental The reliableWrite read-only property of
the interface returns a
boolean that is true if reliable writes to the characteristic
is permitted.

BluetoothCharacteristicPropertiesWritabl.summary:
NOTE Experimental The writableAuxiliaries read-only
property of the interface returns a
boolean that is true if reliable writes to the characteristic
descriptor is permitted.

BluetoothCharacteristicPropertiesWrite.summary:
NOTE Experimental The write read-only property of the
interface returns a
boolean that is true if the writing to the characteristic with
response is permitted.

BluetoothCharacteristicPropertiesWriteWi.summary:
NOTE Experimental The writeWithoutResponse read-only
property of the interface returns a
boolean that is true if the writing to the characteristic
without response is permitted.
